components.description:
A green heart emoji, often used alongside other colored hearts. Frequently used on Twitter in reference to Korean boy band NCT.

Shown with beads of sweat on an orange and pink heart in previous versions of Android.
components.title: Green Heart

description:
A green heart emoji, often used alongside other colored hearts. Frequently used on Twitter in reference to Korean boy band NCT.

Shown with beads of sweat on an orange and pink heart in previous versions of Android.
title: Green Heart

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Heart symbol
emoji_net_data.definition: A green heart emoji. The Android 4.4 artwork for this emoji appeared to show beads of sweat on an orange and pink heart. Green Heart was app http://emojipedia.org/green-heart/
emoji_net_data.name: green heart

bn:00106197a: Having characteristics that attract love or affection

bn:00106204a: Feeling or showing love and affection

bn:00090504v: To have a strong affection for (someone or something).
Have a great affection or liking for
To have an intense feeling of affection and care towards another person.

bn:13611060v: To feel an affection, emotion or love for.

bn:00082367v: To show respect or admiration for.
To feel respect or admiration for.

bn:00031073n: Envy is an emotion which "occurs when a person lacks another's superior quality, achievement, or possession and either desires it or wishes that the other lacked it" Bertrand Russell said that envy was one of the most potent causes of unhappiness.
Resentful emotion that occurs when a person lacks another's (perceived) superior quality, achievement or possession and wishes that the other lacked it
Resentful desire of something possessed by another.
Resentful desire of something possessed by another or others (but not limited to material possessions).
A feeling of discontent or covetousness with regard to another's advantages, success, possessions, etc.
A feeling of grudging admiration and desire to have something that is possessed by another
Envy is an emotion that "occurs when a person lacks another's superior quality, achievement, or possession and either desires it or wishes that the other lacked it".

bn:00052121n: Love is a variety of different feelings, states, and attitudes that ranges from interpersonal affection to pleasure.
An intense feeling of affection and care towards another person.
A strong positive emotion of regard and affection
In the Italian or Latin languages
The form of romantic affection that is considered pure and wholly positive, not just based on feelings of lust.

Love is a word which refers to a variety of different emotional states, feelings or attitudes which range from those of simple personal pleasures or desires to those characterizing interpersonal affection and many forms of profound kindness, compassion, and benevolent concern for the good of others.

bn:00001744n: ?, representing love, the organ, or a card suit
A feeling of love or strong attachment.
Affection is a "disposition or rare state of mind or body" that is often associated with a feeling or type of love.

The heart symbol or "heart shape" is an ideograph used to express the idea of the "heart" in its metaphorical or symbolic sense as the center of emotion, including affection and love, especially romantic love.
Philia, often translated "brotherly love", is one of the four ancient Greek words for love: philia, storge, agape and eros.
A conventional shape or symbol used to represent the heart, love, or emotion: ? or sometimes <3.
Affection, attraction, infatuation, or fondness is a "disposition or rare state of mind or body" that is often associated with a feeling or type of love.
As used by Aristotle in his Nichomachean Ethics
A stylized representation of the muscular organ, used as a symbol for affection, in the shape of two top lobes and a tapering bottom.
Feeling of love or strong attachment.

bn:00036538n: A person other than a family member, spouse or lover whose company one enjoys and towards whom one feels affection.
A person with whom a Windows Live user has established a mutual social connection.
A person you know well and regard with affection and trust

apple_vendor_description: Apple's green heart emoji radiates a fresh, vibrant emerald hue with a satisfyingly plump and glossy appearance, a hallmark of Apple's 3D design.  The soft, rounded edges and the way light bounces off its surface evoke a feeling of natural vitality and well-being.  This emoji is often used to express a love for nature, a healthy lifestyle, or a sense of renewal and hope.
